methods.name: <init>

params.name: version
params.comment: the major version of the language.

params.name: deprecated
params.comment: true if this language should only be used for existing programs.

params.name: compilerSpecDescriptions
params.comment: one or more compiler spec descriptions

params.name: externalNames
params.comment: collection of external tools' names for the language
